website_summaries.verdict: Solid and durable traditional water guns at an appealing price.
pros: Trigger mechanism is easy enough for smaller children to use
Variety of colors to choose from
cons: Decent squirting ability, but not the longest range

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap dollar store quality. Leaked as soon as I filled it with water. Returning. You can get those at any dollar store for 99 cents. 12 bucks for this is outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, and one came broken
customer_reviews.text: Overall, liked the reservoir design, and it had a great pump trigger action. Sadly, one of them came broken, and the other shattered like an egg when it was dropped. Both of them leaked from the tip when inverted, so the sealing wasn't the greatest. It's getting ridiculously hard to find decent water guns anymore. It isn't like the bar is too high, all we want is for them to hold water, shoot a stream of water, and not break the first time you drop the damn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Solid and smart solution
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a plastic adapter, came as a smart aluminium holder which is also very solid.
customer_reviews.author: BUF

customer_reviews.title: They are super cheap, Chinese packaging
customer_reviews.text: I just opened these from the package and one is broken! They are super cheap, Chinese packaging, and flimsy. Terribly disappointed and irritated I held on to them to give to my kids when it got warm and now I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately only lasted 3 days then water leaking out of trigger. Worked good for first 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: 11 children Disappointed in less than 10 Minutes
customer_reviews.text: These squirt guns are cheap and crappy. I bought 6-2 packs for my 11 nieces and nephews to play with at a summer reunion. Within 10 minutes of play every single gun quite squirting. In most cases the pump stopped working. Don't waste your money and end up with a pile of recyclables. Splurge on the good ones. I've never seen so many disappointed faces all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun for young kids but broke fast
customer_reviews.text: works great and easy to bush the buttons for a 3 year old. A lot of times guns stick and make it hard for the young ones. This one is pretty simple and holds a good amount of water. Easy to fill in the pool. Has already added some fun this summer. Good price. That’s what I originally wrote. These broke after about 2 uses. I have other squirt guns that lasted at least the whole summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kozel

customer_reviews.title: The caps don't stay on so if you lay it ...
customer_reviews.text: The caps don't stay on so if you lay it down all the water pours out. I bought them to help train my dog who darks constantly. I learned how poorly they were made when I laid it on my wood coffee table and came back a couple hours later to find all the water spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: One was leaky right out of the box. The ...
customer_reviews.text: One was leaky right out of the box. The other was not water tight at the plug, so it would leak if you laid it down on it's side. Very cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hines

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & no quality
customer_reviews.text: When i unpacked this product i felt it was a scam because of the look of the guns, extremely poor quality . I wanted to return them right away but my wife convinced me to keep them, that if they pumped water that was what matter. The first gun stopped working in the first two (2) minutes of use. The second gun lasted a lot longer, it broke after 20-25 minutes. I was right, it was a scam, they stole from me $13+. Advise: DO NOT purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: JC_Newyorker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, don't work - save your $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these guns last year & they lasted all pool season for 2 very active grandsons. I bought another pair this year as last years guns started having problems. The guns I bought this year were finally opened & lasted maybe 5 minutes. These are pure junk !
customer_reviews.author: Canard_Av8r

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Twins
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year olds for their water fight party. They were able to use them easily and loved that they had special water guns over the rest of the party guests.
customer_reviews.author: JW777

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really stable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really stable. Do yourself a favor and upgrade to the ipad along with the Hoodman hood, so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: emax

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Both guns developed holes pretty quickly (after about three or four times of light play). Once air enters into the “chamber,” there is no squirting.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Bertram

customer_reviews.title: They may be good for pool side / outdoors but I needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: They may be good for pool side / outdoors but I needed a good squirt gun to discourage my cats from getting up on tables! These things leak constantly. They will literally empty themselves in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Coe

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my son and the description said extra large water dispenser. I got mines and it was really small and cheap made. I returned and got a really strong and large one at the store for 1/2 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nilza

customer_reviews.title: Expect these guns to break on day 1
customer_reviews.text: The first time my kids played with these guns they started leaking and falling apart, however they were still in “usable” condition. The second time my kids played with these guns they broke and had to be discarded. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: THese have held up for the first few weeks of being bashed around by a 4 year old. Considering the price I consider them a total success, and will replace them when he eventually does break these.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the 100 water balloons and the two water guns are not what's shown in the photo. They look identical to the water guns you can get at the Dollar Store. Such a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Light, cheap, Dollar Store quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in these! I thought since they were an "Amazon Choice" they would be a good buy... I'll be surprised if they last a month...
customer_reviews.author: sweetviolets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my 3 year old granddaughter loved being able to play with her brothers with her little water guns
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Useless absolute waste of
customer_reviews.text: came broken and the second one broke as soon as it the little one dropped it. Useless absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.author: CHEENU

customer_reviews.title: work great for what we wanted them for
customer_reviews.text: work great for what we wanted them for. (Squirting our barking dogs) tiny bit of leakage, long, but small stream.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bought a couple sets of these. Had to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple sets of these. Had to take the pick up tube out as it was pointing up into the air bubble. Also the pumps address flimsy. 3 out of the 4 I had broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, but ok for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 packs of these. In each box, one leaked and one was fine. I primarily bought them to stop the cats from fighting and for my daughters to play with. I got 4 because I thought it would be cool for my boyfriend and I to join in, but that's not happening.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet Mount!
customer_reviews.text: This mount is fantastic! The base is Aluminum with an ingenuis design that allows the upright that holds the Tablet clamp to collapse completely flat. Because of this, the tablet clamp holds onto the base and is flat, and fits into a nice bag for storage/transport. Very cool design, and it olds the tablet very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Knapp

customer_reviews.title: leaky and broken.
customer_reviews.text: one leaked from the handle, the other didn't shoot straight. both leaked from the tip if tilted down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Agitating critters don't like being squirt with water
customer_reviews.text: They don't leak! Well made. I use these while walking. Agitating critters don't like being squirt with water. Great deterrent. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: LL Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used them for a gender reveal and then gave them to the children.
customer_reviews.author: Pottery Girl

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money or the time returning it
customer_reviews.text: instructions should say...hold water gun pointed upwards while using two fingers to pump it slowly. make sure to not pump too fast or it will not pull the water from the little tank. also be gentle with the trigger because it sticks and then ends up not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. The outer rear plastic broke the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. The outer rear plastic broke the first day on one of the guns when it accidently got dropped by my grandchild while playing with it. The trigger was difficult to pull for a small child and the stream of the gun was wear,.
customer_reviews.author: rre1750

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren loved these water guns and had a wonderful water fight with them and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ron's

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sire beats the garbage at Wal-Mart that didn't last one day. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: tamara w seguin

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and I tried twice. You can’t point them ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaks and I tried twice. You can’t point them downward or the water just streams out and one kept leaking from the trigger button.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, feels solid and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, feels solid and durable. I have been using it for a couple of weeks now with no problems whatsoever. Would definitely recommend it for iPad mini users, changes the experience of flying the magic coming from a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!  Go to Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! They lasted all of 1 day. My husband bought a five-pack for 5 bucks at Walmart and we still have all five, 4 weeks later. At this point if any of the 5 broke we definitely got our money's worth as well as lots of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: JnA Young

customer_reviews.title: Fun water soakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my twin newphews....an they love it...the quality isn't as good as a super soaker but these are cheap and good enough to last a summer or two.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, good quality’s.
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far! No leaks and large capacity. My grandchildren love them,
customer_reviews.author: sleepless

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product
customer_reviews.text: Lousy product. One was cracked. One the trigger broke. They all leaked. Such junk.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a water gun. A very cheaply made water gun.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Nice shooting distance and great colors
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby brother. I like the color and how far it shoots but the only problem is it started dripping after he dropped it on the floor. Its not very good in quality but still does the work. You get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pump broke after only playing with it for 20 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for the best Mavic iPad solution.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, unscrew the top and the post folds down to fit nice and small in one of the net side-pouches of the stock DJI travel bag. In true spirit of the compact Mavic Pro. Really, the perfect ipad air mount for the mavic controller.

customer_reviews.title: Throw the money in trash can

customer_reviews.title: large capacity for a small squirtgun

customer_reviews.title: Heavy add-on to the remote

Aside from those points, it is well built and very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: water guns that work
customer_reviews.text: These water guns hold a lot of water and squirt really well. My kids were thrilled to get them while they were at summer camp. Lots of kids got water guns, but most were very inferior to these. They're not indestructible, but held up well to a lot of use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Emommy

customer_reviews.title: Can't do better...
customer_reviews.text: Great materials and very well made. Does the job perfectly. Best of all, it folds into a small package that fits easily into a side pocket on my Mavic carrying case. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap. I bought these waterguns to fill with vinegar ...
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap. I bought these waterguns to fill with vinegar and eliminate wasps nest on my gutter. First off they don't shoot anywhere near as far as advertised-maybe 12 feet at best. Second there is no stopper on the nozzle of the gun. So as soon as you place the gun down it starts leaking everywhere. Lastly after handling the blue gun my hands were covered in blue residue-like a pen exploded in my hand-the cheap coating rubbed off. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Pjb

customer_reviews.title: Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, not worth the price. I would have returned them but my kiddo was duper excited when they showed up. In daft, he (5yo) was the one that picked them out. Suoer disappointing to see his face based on their lack luster performance and poor quality (leaking from the seams, literally)
